text: ğŸš¨ Measles vaccination saves lives! ğŸ’‰ According to the WHO, accelerated immunization activities have prevented an estimated 57 million deaths between 2000-2022. ğŸ’ª Routine vaccination and mass campaigns in high-case countries are key to reducing measles deaths. ğŸŒ In 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine, and 83% received one dose by their first birthday. ğŸ‰ The Measles & Rubella Partnership (M&RP) is leading the charge to achieve the Immunization Agenda 2030 targets. ğŸ’¯ Let's keep up the good work and protect our communities from measles! ğŸ™
